# Automatic tests

After completing all the steps in the project, automatic tests will become available to you. Tests are run on each commit - once all tasks in the Hexlet interface are completed, make a commit, and the tests will run automatically.

The hexlet-check.yml file is responsible for running these tests - do not delete this file, edit it, or rename the repository.


[![SonarQube Coverage](https:/sonarcloud.io/api/project_badges/measure?project=HellMan1721_python-project-50&metric=coverage)](https://sonarcloud.io/component_measures/metric/coverage/list?id=HellMan1721_python-project-50)

Этот проект предназначен для вывода разницы между файлами. Реализовано --plain выражение - текстовое выражение изменений, --stylish - вывод построчных изменений. Реализован вывод в YAML и JSON. Для большей информацией воспользуйтесь флагом --help.
